section.heading: Designation of target areas for concentrated revitalization

content.p:
* ยง 900. Designation of target areas for concentrated revitalization.
1. The office shall recommend to the cabinet the designation of specific
distressed urban areas wherein a program of concentrated revitalization
shall be directed based upon an assessment of extraordinary need as
determined by the director.
 2. Upon the recommendation of the cabinet and the approval of the
governor to so designate an area wherein a program of concentrated
revitalization shall be directed, the office, in cooperation with
federal, state and local governments and agencies shall develop a plan
to effectuate such targeted concentrated revitalization. Such plan may
include the formation of not-for-profit corporations or subsidiaries of
existent public benefit corporations in such areas, the redirection of
existing programs and resources for the benefit of such areas, and the
creation of such new or expanded programs in such areas as may be
authorized by law.
 * NB Expired March 31, 1985
